name: Naporia
description: The Theme for the Global Game Jam in January and February 2020 was Repair. In 48 hours I brought together Naporia. Way before the age of machines or technology there were two villages that fought for many years, and as they grew and took up more land the distance between them continued to shirk until and now they are next door neighbours. Your job is to help bring conflict to the chaos, peace to the storm, mending and repairing of the very damaged relationships.
